readable.title: 256439287_990ac4a761
readable.content: A man sits in a wheelchair as a woman pushes him . A woman is pushing a man in a wheelchair toward the camera on a brick street while other people are passing behind them . A woman pushes a man in a wheelchair in a European courtyard . A woman pushes a man in a wheelchair ; in the background is an arch . A woman pushing a man in a wheelchair outside .
